pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fuzzy Clustering of Vegetation Data // A set of functions to perform fuzzy clustering of vegetation data [De Cceres et al. (2010) doi:10.1111/j.1654-1103.2010.01211.x] and to assess ecological community ressemblance on the basis of structure and composition [De Cceres et al. (2013): doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12116].
